about: Experienced fullstack web developer with 3 years of hands-on experience in designing and developing PHP-based applications. Seeking opportunities to transition to a role as a frontend web developer using React. Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design principles. Able to collaborate with developers, designers, and stakeholders to provide seamless user experiences.

jobdesk: Developing projects according to the requirements
Designing database scheme for the upcoming projects
Adding new features to existing projects
Analyzing problems of an existing project with lots of data and slow processes
Optimizing codes and queries for an existing project to produce faster process

education.university: Institute Technology of Adhi Tama Surabaya
